item.title: Pre-Surgery Questions To Ask The Doctor
item.description: This post lists some suggested questions you can ask to help you find a doctor you’re most comfortable with for hypospadias treatment.

item.title: Surgery Complications: Fistula
item.description: This post briefly introduces one of the common post-surgery complications, fistula.

item.title: Minimizing Scarring After Hypospadias Surgery
item.description: Many parents worry about scarring after surgery.

item.title: Hypospadias Resources Collection
item.description: This post collects the resources and support that are related to hypospadias.
